title: Google\Cloud\Speech\V1\TranscriptOutputConfig
name: TranscriptOutputConfig
description:
Specifies an optional destination for the recognition results.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.speech.v1.TranscriptOutputConfig

params.name: data.gcs_uri
params.description: Specifies a Cloud Storage URI for the recognition results. Must be specified in the format: gs://bucket_name/object_name, and the bucket must already exist.
